main event: Two inhabitants of Pitigliano, Italy reported a sighting of a round object making a strange, loud noise on 14 Sep 1954.
interesting points: The object made a strange, loud noise., The object came to a standstill before disappearing at high speed., The sighting was part of a series of UFO sightings reported in Europe., The object was described as round and white., Insufficient data for detailed analysis was available.
